numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Women of color have a high percentage in the graph.
2. A high percentage of women of color means that many women of color get a chance to be equal players and head coaches.
3. The National Football League diversifies players well.
4. The National Basketball Association diversifies players well.
5. Major League Baseball has a lower percentage of people of color than the other leagues.
6. The percentage of people of color in Major League Baseball is less than 50 percent.
7. Major League Soccer has a slightly lower percentage of people of color than the other leagues.
8. The percentage of people of color in Major League Soccer is more than 50 percent.
9. Major League Soccer has the highest percentage of head coaches who are people of color.
10. I wonder why Major League Baseball does not have as many people of color as the other leagues.
11. I thought that every sport would have at least 50 percent people of color.
12. Major League Baseball needs more diversification.
13. Major League Baseball lacks people of color compared to the other leagues and associations.
14. This situation does not have much impact on me.
15. This situation probably has a slight impact on my community.
16. I am glad that sports have more diversification.
17. I am South Asian.
18. If a South Asian person is interested in these sports then race does not stop this person.
19. I am glad that diversification has a positive impact on sports.
20. The graph shows the percentage of players of color in different sports leagues and associations.
21. The graph shows the percentage of head coaches of color in different sports leagues and associations.
22. The main idea of the graph is the diversification in different sports leagues and associations.
23. The title is: The Diversification in Different Sports Leagues and Associations.
